es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.metrics.rel

Interface RelevanceModel.UserRelevanceModel<U,I>

  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    I - type of the items
    All Superinterfaces:
    UserModel.Model<U>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IdealRelevanceModel.UserIdealRelevanceModel<U,I>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ERRIA.ERRRelevanceModel.UserERRRelevanceModel, NDCG.NDCGRelevanceModel.UserNDCGRelevanceModel
    Enclosing class:
    RelevanceModel<U,I>

    public static interface RelevanceModel.UserRelevanceModel<U,I>
extends UserModel.Model<U>
    User-specific relevance models.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double gain(I item)
      Gain obtained by recommending the item.
      boolean isRelevant(I item)
      Determines whether an item is relevant to the user or not

    • Method Detail

      • isRelevant

        boolean isRelevant(I item)
        Determines whether an item is relevant to the user or not
        Parameters:
        item - item to be judged as relevant
        Returns:
        true if the item is relevant, false otherwise

      • gain

        double gain(I item)
        Gain obtained by recommending the item. Should be typically positive if the item is relevant, and 0 otherwise.
        Parameters:
        item - item whose gain is calculated
        Returns:
        numerical gain
